body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Jose Clark and I'm from SecureDrive Solutions. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Joyce. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling excited as I'm considering purchasing a security system for my car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's great to hear, Joyce. To better assist you, could you please provide us with the make and model of your car?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I drive a two zero two zero Toyota Corolla LE.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Joyce. And could you also provide the ZIP code of your location for our reference?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My ZIP code is two one four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Joyce. We will look into the best security options for your car in your area. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help, Jose.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Joyce. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
